Group.Title: Cartesian Chart
Group.Description: Plot over 7 chart types with extensive features like data label, and zooming.

Group.Title: Circular Chart
Group.Description: Visualize the data using pie and doughnut charts.

Group.Title: Tab View
Group.Description: A simple tab navigation interface that allows users to explore and switch tabs.

Group.Title: Radial Gauge
Group.Description: Visualize one or multiple measures on a circular scale with pointers and ranges.

Group.Title: Linear Gauge
Group.Description: Visualize one or multiple measures on a linear scale with pointers and ranges.

Group.Title: Barcode Generator
Group.Description: Generate and display data in machine-readable 1D and 2D barcodes.

Group.Title: ListView
Group.Description: Displays the set of data items in different layouts or views and in groups.

Group.Title: Range Selector
Group.Description: Visualize data and select a date or numeric range.

Group.Title: Slider
Group.Description: The horizontal slider enables you to select a date or a numeric value.

Group.Title: Range Slider
Group.Description: The horizontal range slider enables you to select a date or a numeric range.

Group.Title: Vertical Slider
Group.Description: The vertical slider enables you to select a date or a numeric value.

Group.Title: Vertical Range Slider
Group.Description: The vertical range slider enables you to select a date or a numeric range.

Group.Title: Radial Slider
Group.Description: Selects a numeric value in a radial scale. Designed using radial gauge control.

Group.Title: Radial Range Slider
Group.Description: Selects a numeric range in a radial scale. Designed using radial gauge control.

Group.Title: Scheduler
Group.Description: Allows you to easily visualize and schedule appointments.

Group.Title: Effects View
Group.Description: Provides ripple, highlight, scaling and rotation effects for any view.

Group.Title: Badge View
Group.Description: Badge shows a circle or rectangle which contain a number or message.

Group.Title: DocIO
Group.Description: A .NET Word library to create, read, and edit Word documents programmatically.

Group.Title: PDF
Group.Description: A .NET PDF library to create, read, and edit PDF files programmatically.

Group.Title: Presentation
Group.Description: A .NET PowerPoint library to create, read, and edit PowerPoint files programmatically.

Group.Title: XlsIO
Group.Description: A .NET Excel library to create, read, and edit Excel documents programmatically.
